text: Mario Pineida (born 6 July 1992) is an Ecuadorian footballer who plays as a Left back for Barcelona SChttp://www.ecuagol.com/ecuagol/index.php?n=84394http://www.ecuagol.com/ecuagol/index.php?n=85316 in the Ecuadorian Serie A. Pineida was called up for the 2015 Copa América making the cut for the final 23 this time around. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian footballers Category:Ecuadorian Serie A players Category:C.S.D. title: Mario Pineida
